RITES Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 30 Senior Technical Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 04, 2025, 09:30 IST
 Rail India Technical and Economic Services
 30 Jobs |  Posted On : 04-Aug-2025 |  Haryana |  Salary : 29,735 to 29,735




FOLLOW

The Rail India Technical and Economic Services Limited (RITES) has officially released the notification to fill 30 Senior Technical Assistant posts. The interested applicants can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Civil Engineering can apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Haryana.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Senior Technical Assistant	30	Diploma in Civil Engineering.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the Written Test.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee 

For OBC/General candidates: Rs. 300/-.
For SC/ST/PWD candidates: Rs. 100/-.

RITES Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 29,735/- per month.
How to Apply for the RITES Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the RITES Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	01-08-2025
Closing date	23-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
